import numpy as np
a=[float(i) for i in input().split(',')]
m,n=[int(i) for i in input().split(',')]
x=a[::2]
y=a[1::2]
vx=np.mean(x)
vy=np.mean(y)
x1=np.array(x)-vx
y1=np.array(y)-vy
cov1=np.sum(x1**2/(m-1))
cov2=np.sum(y1**2/(m-1))
cov3=np.sum(x1*y1/(m-1))
z=np.array([[cov1,cov3],[cov3,cov2]])
c,d=np.linalg.eig(z)
i=np.argmax(c)
p1,p2=d[:,i]
if p2>=0:
    sign="+"
print("第1主成分={0:.5f}*(x1-{1:.2f}){2}{3:.5f}*(x2-{4:.2f})".format(p1,vx,sign,p2,vy))
